Name: Pratiksha Raval
Title: Best experience
Review: Excellent wort,beautiful design,vibrant colour.Pratiksha Raval,HOD Hiray institute of Design,Interior dept.

Name: Gulnar Siddiqui
Title: Best experience
Review: Very good collection... excellent work.. original pottery and good quality... must visit  store .. ...

Name: Chinmay
Title: Wonderful
Review: it was a great conversation with Anil ji  her art is incredible.Thank you for the beautiful gift ❣️❣️

Name: Roshan
Title: Beautiful Blue pottery and more
Review: An exhilarating experience to see the beauty of the Blue pottery. Met Anil ji and he explained the intricacies of the beautiful art and made me make some beautiful jewellery. An experience that must not be missed

Name: Parth Desai
Title: Wonderful pottery and team who works here amazing.
Review: Wonderful experience, beautiful place, great employees. Great quality, easy to buy, and very nice people.

Name: Oshin J
Title: Mesmerising visit !!
Review: It was an absolutely refreshing and memorable visit, walking through the process of how the pottery is made and the detailing and time that goes into each piece .. the owner is a humble and lovely man patient enough to explain and allow us to enjoy the experience.. he also gave us little gifts to always remember the experience.. a must visit in Jaipur

Name: Pulkit S
Title: Blue pottery art
Review: It is a nice place to visit . The blue pottery is the art used since last 10 generation . You can visit here and meet owner Mr. Anil who is really a nice person will give you a detailed description about Blue pottery. I really love the art promoted by him and it must be spread all over the world. I would request you to come here and explore the blue art whenever you are in Jaipur.Thank you Mr. Anil Doraya Ji for this kind gesture ,will never forget this . It the best thing in Jaipur I really enjoyed it.

Name: Nitin Deshmukh
Title: Art love
Review: The ancient indian pottery making experience is awesome, mr. Anil is keeping this art alive. Worth to visit.

Name: Riya Sharma
Title: I just love that place
Review: Hi today we visited blue pottery Art Centre its a beautiful place to and we had wonderful time . The staff and Owner are so polite and so genuine. They are  welcoming and polite . Loved that place ❤️

Name: Kishore
Title: A great experience
Review: We saw many varieties of blue pottery in various forms. Thanks to Anil ji and his team. We look forward to coming again.

Name: Sahana
Title: Great work!
Review: Absolutely stunning hand made collections. Great to witness the Oldest art and feeling blessed to know the story behind these beautiful art. Thank you somuch for the gift and warm welcome!

Name: Jenni L
Title: Beautiful Jaipur blue pottery
Review: Very friendly and helpful owner and artist, the experience was lovely! the pottery is also of course very beautiful, highly recommend!!

Name: Ishita C
Title: Best place for pottery shopping
Review: The shop is full of unique variety with hand painted designs on pottery and the uncle is really polite and helpful for selecting the items. He understands how the process is done for the pottery.

Name: Vasundhara Dani
Title: Best visit
Review: This is an amazing store not just for the beautiful collection they showcase but also for the passion with which Anil uncle shares his knowledge and experiences. Must visit place.This is my second visit to this pretty spot.

Name: Parul Chaturvedi
Title: Blue Pottery Art
Review: I loved being here, it was an amazing soothing experience. I got to know about the history as well as an experience of creating a jewellery on my own.

Name: sharon k
Title: Art
Review: Unique art collection comes from great hands, Reasonable prices  !Must visit place in Jaipur, Rajasthan

Name: Foram Veera
Title: Jaipur blue pottery!
Review: We entered this shop with the thought of making a quick exit but we ended up spending two hours including spending time with the artist who is a national awarded Shri Anil Doraya Ji..  I can not express my experience in words - but this place is a must visit to experience the real blue pottery which Jaipur is famous for! The youth in us must do it's effort to keep this art alive! Thank you! - Foram Veera

Name: Gitanjali Deb
Title: Excellent
Review: What a brilliant experience at Jaipur art gallery . Loved the humble behaviour of the owner Anil Sir, he taught me and my friend how to make a neck piece and gifted us. Simple overwhelmed with his gesture.

Name: Aravind R
Title: Exciting
Review: Had a nice experience here.Anil sir taught our daughter to make a nice pendant. So exciting to be here.

Name: Liam E
Title: Very friendly, lovely product
Review: We loved this shop. Really friendly owners, showed us around the nearby factory. No ‘hard sell’, but we loved the traditional blue and bought a set of plates. Highly recommend!

Name: Purab C
Title: Great!
Review: Great hands on experience. Highly recommend this place, the owner and staff are great! Great value prices for hand made pottery made within Jaipur.

Name: Sonal Srivastava
Title: Must visit i visited 2 time.
Review: I loved it here and it was mesmerizing experience and what can I do to promote this craft is through digital medium because mostly generations is on online platform and using it daily and we can showcases this art by showing all this process so that people could connect with the process and feel connected and would appreciate the work.

Name: Nancy N
Title: Amazing famous shop
Review: Beautiful shop, we bought a masterpiece, the owner is very friendly and artistic, he gave us good deal. We collect pottery from around the world.

Name: Sarkis
Title: Blue pottery museum
Review: Anil greeted me with his smile and made me feel true happiness with his delicate sense of fashion and amazing collection. Must see in Jaipur.

Name: shrishty singh
Title: The owner is the 9th generation artist from his family carrying forward the legacy of the beautiful Blue pottery.
Review: Amazing place with an amazing collection of the world famous Blue Pottery of Jaipur. A must visit place for all the art enthusiasts. You will definitely find a lot of stuff like plates, flower vases, key holders, coffee mugs, letter tiles and many other things that you really would really want to keep as a souvenir from the Pink City.And particularly the owner of this store Mr Anil Doraya uncle, who is still carrying the legacy of his ancestors as being 9th generation from his family in creating this beautiful art. And the hospitality was the cherry on the top. A for sure recommended place from my side if you plan your trip to Jaipur.

Name: Sudeep Shetkar
Title: Best place for blue pottery
Review: Excellent collection with excellent patterns and amazing people to meet. Very nice and unique experience. Must visit place for blue pottery.

Name: Senjal Pandharpatte
Title: Not just a shop, and experience
Review: Beautiful pottery and very friendly owner. It’s not just a shop its an experience, they give you information about the age old blue pottery- how its made, it’s history. They also have a factory where you can take a look at the making of it as well!!

Name: Manuel O
Title: Best place to buy blue pottery in Jaipur
Review: Great place to buy a piece of a dying art that should be preserved and protected. The owner is extremely kind and his family has been doing this for nine generations in Jaipur, he also has some workshops for people interested in learning this beautiful craft. And they take credit card!

Name: dineshkaku
Title: Awesome Experience at Blue Pottery
Review: I went along with my kids and asked Anil to get hold my son and don't let him go, so he can learn pottery. My son skipped but my daughter did the course and was thrilled with her achievements. Anil  felt emotional about the scenario and offered my son free 3 day classes when we come back again. Anil is a fantastic artist and we very friendly. Thank you for a great experience.

Name: Lasya reddy nandyala
Title: Amazing collection
Review: Amazing collection with amazing patterns and amazing people to meetAmazing workshops to learn and visitFrom dr lasya reddy nandyalaVijayawadaAndhra pradesh

Name: Harshathah
Title: Blue pottery experience
Review: We took part in the 3hr workshop. Had a great time. Learned a lot. Mr. Anil was very friendly and taught us so much! Loved the collection as well. 10/10 recommend visiting this place when in Jaipur.

Name: Charan
Title: Excellent
Review: Amazing place to learn pottery and to paint. They are professionals and are very friendly with us. In case you guy’s visit then pls do take videos in order to help them get reach on social media. I came all the way from Chennai and had a very good experience here.

Name: George P
Title: Great experience on blue pottery
Review: Excellent hospitality. We could gain more  knowledge on blue pottery which we were new to. Artist Mr. Anil Doraya himself explained on the craft and gifted us a souvenir. Such nice and aesthetic pieces can be found here. Would like to visit whenever we are in Jaipur.

Name: Radhika Tilak
Title: Amazing
Review: GEM OF JAIPUR!Must visit place in Jaipur. They have absolutely gorgeous collection of all authentic pottery. Also don’t fail to visit their newly launched fabric section. It is as special as any other monument in Jaipur. The owner Mr. Anil ji has golden heart.

Name: Samar Pratap Singh
Title: I am extremely happy to see this gallery
Review: What a gallery, must visit. History of Jaipur. History of blue colour. History of Mr Anil doraya. Thanks

Name: shanbirsingh
Title: Must visit , excellent
Review: Awesome, must visit shop , if you missed it then your trip is unsuccessful. Must visit shop in Jaipur.

Name: aish
Title: Good
Review: Very good artistic design. Had fun, they even explained how they make. Workshop was fun. Must visit.

Name: Sayali
Title: Wonderful
Review: A very different and amazing experience. They have very good collection of pottery and the people of the store are pretty welcoming.

Name: Manu G
Title: Excellent
Review: Had a wonderful experience. They probably have the best collection. Apart from pottery, they also sell things like bedsheets and dress materials which are very unique.

Name: Chinmay
Title: Awesome experience!!
Review: An absolutely wonderful experience in this old and famous pottery shop! The owner and chief artist Mr Anil is very friendly and a delight to talk with!I recommend every traveller to visit his shop when in Jaipur!

Name: Abhishek M
Title: Must visit place in Jaipur
Review: Wonderful place for buying pottery. Must visit place in Jaipur. Owner and his team is very helpful. They also have a workshop.

Name: Sunil biswas
Title: Fabulous
Review: Favourite things with awesome collection of true Jaipur poetry art work feels amazing and fabulous..

Name: mitesh
Title: Excellent Work.
Review: Excellent Services And Mind Blowing Blue pottery.Must Visit This Place.. Excellent Work... Excellent Collection..

Name: Safari612801
Title: Amazing, beautiful pottery and gallery.
Review: We had a brilliant time viewing the beautiful art and pottery. We were given lots of knowledge and history. Anil, the artist was a lovely man and offered me a complementary pottery class after our visit.This gallery is a must when you visit Jaipur.

Name: Neha BK
Title: Awesome store for Jaipur Pottery
Review: Had an amazing experience at the pottery size.Also had a very good varasa tea which one must try for sure.The tea was very amazing😀

Name: Phanish
Title: Great, trying to get a mridangam with pottery
Review: Myself being a mridangam artist loved the experience here. The art center owner Anil was very welcoming. He being an artist himself learnt a quite a bit of pottery. We discussed about making mridangam in pottery going back to good old days when instrument was made of pottery.

Name: Lakshita Jain
Title: Factory outlet
Review: We visited the factory and had an amazing experience. They have a very warm personality and they show the work very nicely.

Name: Siddhika
Title: Factory visit
Review: Visited the factory, amazing experience. Loved the products. The factory owner was kind enough to show us around the factory

Name: Manoj Praveen
Title: Best place and Best person
Review: Best Place where you can Find Best Blue pottery in Jaipur. Invited him for my Marriage personally.It's great to be there.

Name: shreeya d
Title: Art worth living
Review: This place should be the first on your list. Please make the time to attend the workshop and walk around the shop. It is worth every second of your time!

Name: Hiya
Title: Varsha Tea and all things beautiful
Review: The artist/owner was very cordial, so proud of the heritage. Went into great details of its history.

Name: Mrinal Dubey
Title: Excellent ✨️
Review: We came to Jaipur for a short trip and decided to visit the Blue Pottery Art centre. The experience was surreal. We learnt so much about the art form and worthing here is so beautiful. The owner and his craftsmen are so skilled and helpful. They patiently taught us about the history of this art form and how the artifacts are made. I would highly recommend this place to every one visiting Jaipur.

Name: Sanjana
Title: The unknown art
Review: I had been to jecrc college for a training and came to know about Blue Pottery. The best place to learn the art and shop(if you are a non artist like me) but on the whole a place must to visit

Name: Josh P
Title: Must Visit
Review: The owner and master craftsman of the store gave a lovely presentation of how the pottery was made and how the trade is passed down through generations. He also has a fantastic sense of humor. This is definitely a must visit place while in Jaipur!

Name: Priyanka A
Title: Awesome
Review: It was the best experience ever. Mr. Anil dorahein is very knowledgeable and gave us all the information.A must visit . You cannot go to jaipur and not visit the blue pottery centre.We got our courrier on time.  A little Crack in the plate he replaced it for us. No questions asked.Lovely place.Agrawal.

Name: Rich
Title: Excellent to purchase blue pottery
Review: It is a great shop to see and learn Rajasthan culture under one roof, the great hospitality of the owner makes u feel like home

Name: Tanya T
Title: Jaipur Blue art pottery : an amazing experience !
Review: Very fulfilling experience in this blue pottery art workshop. It’s amazing how hand art like blue pottery still exists in this age and how important it is to keep it alive

Name: fozjon
Title: good. If this is your thing
Review: my wife has been wanting to go for a long time. To me, it wasn't anything all that special. My wife found many things to buy here. People were kind and the place wasn't too crowded.

Name: sneha a
Title: Great for blue pottery
Review: Really nice experience at the Blue pottery art center where the owner showed the details of the art form and even taught me how to make a pendant in 2 mins.

Name: Pink panthor
Title: Amazing legacy of jaipur
Review: Great art amazing blue pottery met the owner he had a great depth of what's the history and how it evolved to become

Name: Piyush Sethy
Title: Immersive Indian pottery
Review: The store gives an immersive experience to authentic Indian art. When I entered the store, I was warmly welcome by the employees and given an thorough explanation in the intricate processes behind this beautiful pottery. The whole store has an amazing history and it needs to be preserved. Therefore, I will be writing news articles to spread this authentic Indian art.

Name: Seema N
Review: Art is never finished, only abandoned. In Jaipur we really experienced  versatility  in the art form, especially Jaipur blue pottery made us realize that art is beyond over imagination.  Thank you to Mr Anilji for explaining  us the process of manufacturing  blue pottery.

Name: Mrigank G
Title: Best blue pottery shop in Jaipur, Rajasthan
Review: Had an amazing experience at the blue pottery centre. One of the most iconic shops in the city and rajasthan. We came two years back and had forgotten an item at the shop. The owner specially couriered the item to us in Delhi with warm regards for our new marriage. The best blue pottery shop in the country with an owner who has a heart of gold. Thanks!! Will visit again!

Name: Sukanya
Title: Magical and fresh
Review: My favourite part are the plates where hidden pictures we can see. They are so wonderful and amazing

Name: Elodie T
Title: Beautiful art
Review: Beautiful craftsmanship at reasonable prices. The owner and staff were very helpful and knowledgeable. This shop has been around for 45 years and you can see that they know their art. Amazing shop!

Name: NatV
Title: A must visit when in Jaipur
Review: Amazing place! So many wonderful arts and affordable pieces. The owner was really nice to us! Will defo come back!

Name: Harshitha P
Title: Very good experience
Review: A very good experience. I learnt a lot here about blue pottery from Jaipur and had a good experience hearing from the owners.

Name: priyaa v
Title: A must visit experience in Jaipur
Review: Delighted to be here ! The art work and appealing colors are like meditation. Such an unique experience and was so glad to meet Mr.Ashok Sir. He was so thought provoking and spending time understanding his award winning collections was pure bliss. It's a must visit when in Jaipur.

Name: Reshma
Title: Mind blown
Review: It’s a dream come true for art lovers… the intricate designs and work is impressive.You would want to buy the entire store …Beautiful collection and great staff..

Name: ayelet
Title: wonderful
Review: the place is amazing! great art ❤️ and the people are so nice.we’ve been here hours.they are also looking for workers, who wants to learn this beautiful art, in a lovely place and a relaxing environment.

Name: Katie S
Title: Amazing shopping experience
Review: Great experience, very very good options and variety, affordable prices. My friend had birthday and they gave her some gifts and made us feel so welcome.

Name: Sai Nivarthi
Title: Amazing craft of Jaipur
Review: It was a great experience to explore all the blue pottery of Jaipur in one place. As a cherry on the top, we got to meet Mr. Anil ji who's a definite master of his craft. I'm looking forward to attend his workshop next time I'm in Jaipur.

Name: Darshika R
Title: Must Visit Shop in Jaipur
Review: I Love this shop, the owner will really impress you. He will impress you with his knowledge and teach you about blue pottery. The items available here are super unique and definitely worth the visit. It is must visit in Jaipur.

Name: rashmi p
Title: The dying art needs your attention!!
Review: This is about blue pottery art which is dying. It needs support from govt and students. Students who are interested in arts should learn this art and help it revive. This place has awesome collection of blue pottery and they have their workshop as well.

Name: Sree
Title: Great experience. Must visit.
Review: Had a lovely experience here. Mr. Anil is an amazing artist, and treats all customers with remarkable hospitality. He gave me a token gift and even offered taking a free blue pottery workshop. Was a wonderful encounter and I would love to go back.

Name: Pravitha A
Title: Very good
Review: Nice ambience. People inside there are very nice. I would love to attend their workshop. Main person right now is very famous for his artistry

Name: Eric H
Title: 5 stars, would recommend
Review: Very helpful staff without pressure.  It's a 9th generation shop owned and run by the family.  Beautiful pottery and excellent tea.

Name: Nam Anh T
Title: Learning traditional techniques
Review: Amazing experience learning traditional techniques unique to the family running the shop. The shop also showcases award winning items along with every-day homeward.

Name: Muralidhar
Title: Must visit place in jaipur
Review: It was a good experience , must visit place, fine arts, happy place with good ambiance and try special tea

Name: Sanjeeb Hazarika
Title: Mind blowing
Review: Very beautiful Art form of Jaipur, unique & stuning colour combination still survived in this modern technology world . We all need to extend our help to keep this art form alive

Name: Kashika
Title: Awesome Experience!
Review: Our 8 year daughter Jaishvi Mishra insisted us to see and visit Blue pottery for what Jaipur is famous for. We stepped in the Blue pottery center expecting to see the art and what followed was a unique encounter with Anil Sir - the master artist of Blue pottery .He explained my daughter the intricacies of the art and even welcome her for learning the art. He was happy to learn that our daughter was learning Tabla and gave us many  insights for developing her talent. Even he gifted few Blue pottery work as a token of love and appreciation. We had a truly mesmerizing experience and would like to revisit the centre to learn the art from the God of Art himeself. Thankyou Sir for keeping the art alive! It speaks volumes about our culture and heritage.Very very proud and thankful to you.

Name: Neha
Title: Blue pottery
Review: Lovely to see the work and art by anil ji . He is lovely by nature and passionate for his art .. Do visit this place for a in depth knowledge of the blue pottery art

Name: Suraj KT
Title: Blue pottery
Review: Mr. Anil Doraya is so passionate about his art which was very refreshing to see. Before showing us his work he explained the entire process that goes into making blue pottery. Was a great learning experience and I enjoyed viewing his award winning pieces as well.

Name: Nakul Poonacha
Title: Visit to Blue pottery art
Review: Nayonika The designs and colours of the pottery are very beautiful and interesting.  It's very interesting to learn about how these designs are made and the whole process that leads to these unique pottery designs.

Name: Kaushik M
Title: Wonderful artist and wonderful person to deal with
Review: Anil sir is not only a wonderful artist but also we had a good time talking to him learning about the history of blue pottery.

Name: Emma
Title: Lovely
Review: Beautiful shop and pottery is exquisite. The teacher is very wise and kind. Everyone should visit this shop :)

Name: Keshav Mishra
Title: Jaipur Blue Pottery, Pleasure of meeting Mr. Anil Doraya
Review: It was a pleasure to meet Me. Anil Doraya, President Award Winning artist for blue pottery. He took us to his workshop and showed us the delicate that he and team has done. Amazing person and extraordinary artist. Thanks Sir, humbled to meet you.

Name: Aditya k
Title: Blue pottery!
Review: Absolutely gorgeous place and a wonderful collection of pottery items :) We bought a few pieces for our home, will definitely be back again!

Name: Tobie S
Title: Thanks and gratitude😊
Review: This place is so beautiful! Thank you for your beautiful pottery and the keychain for my mother! Blessings to you!

Name: Vidisha
Title: would recommend this to anyone who has an eye for art work. best artist, best artwork. wish they get renowned worldwide.
Review: stumbled upon this amazing pottery workshop in Jaipur, known as Jaipur Blue Pottery Art Centre, and was left completely awestruck. had a wonderful interactive session with Mr.Anil Doraya, not only did he explain about this beautiful artwork, but also gave us hands-on experience.

Name: Reuel
Title: Highly Recommended
Review: Amazing place . Very friendly people. Huge variety of items Loved this placeMust Visit. Highly Recommended

Name: Mabel
Title: Best 👌🏻
Review: The experience was wonderful. There are many beautiful art pieces to buy. Worth it! You can learn a lot of new things, here.

Name: L2143
Title: Original blue pottery
Review: Exelente work and original blue pottery.. must visit place please visit factory.. good products .. worth of buying from here..

Name: Mohammed aslam K
Title: Amazing experience with a talented and truly well recognised Blue Pottery Artist
Review: We had a visit with family to this Blue Pottery Art center and workshop in Aug 2022. Mr. Anil Doraya, the chief Artist of this rarely known handicrafts field is a well recognised and friendly person, explained about his Art. This place vis worth of visit if you are a art and culture lover. You can buy rarely crafted and beautiful items to decorate your home.

Name: Sania
Title: Blue pottery art
Review: This hidden blue pottery store is a hidden gem in the pink city of Jaipur. I had an amazing experience with the owner of the store.

Name: hyacinthalopes
Title: Great collection
Review: The owner is very helpful. Blue pottery collection is very good and we also bought some hand paintings. We have been here multiple times during this visit. Also there are free blue pottery classes organized during the month of June. Do visit if you are in Jaipur...

Name: raghav khanna
Title: Beat blue pottery store in India
Review: Amazing blue pottery collection. I’m visiting this centre past 20yrs and they have huge collection with wide array of designs and products. Owner is extremely friendly!

Name: Anugraha SN
Title: Blue pottery art centre Jaipur
Review: Wonderful experience. Thoroughly enjoyed watching  the process of blue pottery art. It is a proud moment that Indian craftsmanship is being practiced for generations in Jaipur. It is incredible that Mr. Anil Doraya has been practicing and passing on this tradition on a global. Recommending everyone to visit this Blue art pottery centre. I came across this original beautiful shop from Barkha Jaipur Vlog.

Name: Reeja
Title: Awsome
Review: Must visit place..Very supportive  and helpful staff  and we can learn from them .We must take training from them...

Name: Nadia L
Title: A Cultural & Educational Experience.
Review: Blue Pottery is a dying art that needs revival.Anil is 9th generation pottery maker, and you can tell his love for his art by his words (and prices too). We had the opportunity to take our kids to his factory and he was kind enough to not only show us how it is all made, but with each piece he has on display came learnings of history & culture. It was truly an educational and enlightening experience.
